item.title: Crystal add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "When a hurricane damaged my father's house, my brother rushed over with a gas grill, three coolers of beer, and an enormous Fuck-It Bucket - a plastic pail filled with jawbreakers and bite-size candy bars. ("When shit brings you down, just say 'fuck it,' and eat yourself some motherfucking candy.")" -- David Sedaris

item.title: Crystal add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "I don't want to repeat my innocence. I want the pleasure of losing it again." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Crystal add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "I like people and I like them to like me, but I wear my heart where God put it, on the inside. " -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "Sometimes I can hear my bones straining under the weight of all the lives I'm not living." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "I love you also means I love you more than anyone loves you, or has loved you, or will love you, and also, I love you in a way that no one loves you, or has loved you, or will love you, and also, I love you in a way that I love no one else, and never have loved anyone else, and never will love anyone else." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "Why didn't I learn to treat everything like it was the last time. My greatest regret was how much I believed in the future." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "I regret that it takes a life to learn how to live." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "When I looked at you, my life made sense. Even the bad things made sense. They were necessary to make you possible." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Crystal add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss
